title: Hailey Bieber shows off her Virgil Abloh-designed wedding gown
text:
Hailey Bieber shows off her Virgil Abloh-designed wedding gown originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Justin and Hailey Bieber are re-living their wedding day on Instagram.

The newlyweds shared several images on social media Monday, in which the bride's dress is revealed in detail for the first time.

Hailey Bieber wore a dress designed by Virgil Abloh, complete with a veil that read, "Till death do us part."

"Last Monday was the most special day of my life," she captioned one image.

(MORE: Check out the first pics from Justin and Hailey Bieber’s second wedding)

"@virgilabloh thank you for making my vision come to life and creating my dream dress. You and your @off____white team are incredible and I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation," she added.

Justin Bieber, 25, and Hailey Bieber, formerly Baldwin, 22, legally married last year, and celebrated with loved ones, including Kendall and Kylie Jenner, at the Montage Palmetto Bluff in South Carolina on Sept. 30.

The couple had been friends for years, but weren't romantically linked until 2016.
